argument.name: Expression
argument.description: Character. A logical variable or expression that evaluates to .T. (TRUE) or .F. (FALSE).

argument.name: Label
argument.description: Character. A unique label for the region that the condition applies to.

page.description: The {CONDITION} command allows the display of Xdialog elements to be turned on or off, depending on how a logical expression is evaluated.
